short_summary: Lease of a photocopier for 60 months, the option to extend, is proposed with the need to provide the equipment necessary for its installation, tools for maintenance and a comprehensive user guide in French.
description: The Correctional Service Canada is looking to lease a photocopier for 60 months. With an optional extension for the photocopier lease, it includes the equipping with necessary installation and training.
full_summary:
================================

### Production Photocopier for Correctional Services Canada

** Invitation to Bid **

**Title:** 2BP3-130113 - Production Photocopier for Correctional Services Canada (english), 
PHOTOCOPIEUR DE PRODUCTION POUR SERVICE CORRECTIONNEL CANADA (french)

**Reference Number:** SSC-23-00022535:T

**Issue Date:** April 13, 2023
**Closing Date:** May 24, 2023 2:00 PM EST

**Background:**

Correctional Services Canada is seeking a contractor to supply, deliver, and install a production photocopier for a period of 60 months, with the option to extend the lease by two 12-month periods. The contract includes necessary maintenance, training, and installation of the equipment in French to ensure users can access all required features.

**Scope of Work:**

* Supply, delivery, and installation of the production photocopier
* Necessary maintenance, including:
	+ Parts and material
	+ Labour and travel related to maintenance
* Training in French:
	+ User manual and instructions
	+ Demonstration and training for users

**Contracting Entity:**

* Shared Services Canada, 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, ON K0A 0C3

**End User Entity:**

* Correctional Services Canada, 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, ON K0A 0C3

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Jesse Squirrell
* Email: jesse.squirrell@ssc-spc.gc.ca
* Phone: 613-791-6257
* Fax: 000-000-0000

**Notice Documents and Attachments:**

The documents related to this contract are available for download from the Shared Services Canada website at the following URLs:

* https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/F61218D4-2B1C-4F4A-93B6-21866D08E271
* https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/9AF37204-77FC-4C23-AD58-3FC2B6E36C9A

This service contract is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and is open to bids from qualified contractors.	Please contact the contracting entity if you have any questions. Logged
